pages.title: Dwarf
pages.text: This entity is usually neutral. It won't attack other NPCs and only attacks the player if he attacks first. If he is near a $(l:e_block_dwarf_base_marker)Dwarf Base Marker/el, he will start strip-mining. The only place where Dwarves can be found is in $(l:e_structure_dwarf_base)Dwarf Bases/el in the $(l:e_dimension_insanity_dimension)Insanity Dimension/el and $(l:e_dimension_depth_dimension)Depth Dimension/el.
